exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat f := fun (k i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) => match ρ with | INCₐ x => INCₐ (pos_nxt x) | DECₐ x j => DECₐ (pos_nxt x) (if Nat.eq_dec i j then 1 + k else if le_lt_dec k j then 0 else j) end : nat -> nat -> mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_instr (pos (S n)) g := fix g (k i : nat) P {struct P} : list (mm_instr (pos (S n))) := match P with | nil => nil | ρ :: P0 => f k i ρ :: g k (S i) P0 end : nat -> nat -> list (mm_instr (pos n)) -> list (mm_instr (pos (S n))) g_app : forall (k i : nat) P Q, g k i (P ++ Q) = g k i P ++ g k (length P + i) Q g_app_inv : forall (k i : nat) P (l r : list (mm_instr (pos (S n)))), g k i P = l ++ r -> exists L R : list (mm_instr (pos n)), P = L ++ R /\\ l = g k i L /\\ r = g k (length l + i) R length_g : forall (l i : nat) P, length (g l i P) = length P g_subcode : forall (k i : nat) P (j : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)), (j, ρ :: nil) <sc (i, P) -> (j, f k j ρ :: nil) <sc (i, g k i P) subcode_g : forall (k i : nat) P (j : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos (S n))), (j, ρ :: nil) <sc (i, g k i P) -> exists ρ' : mm_instr (pos n), (j, ρ' :: nil) <sc (i, P) /\\ ρ = f k j ρ' g_loops : forall (k i : nat) P, 1 <= i -> i + length P <= k -> mm_no_self_loops (i, g k i P) P : list (mm_instr (pos n)) R := DECₐ pos0 0 :: DECₐ pos0 (3 + lP) :: DECₐ pos0 (2 + lP) :: nil : list (mm_instr (pos (S n))) sc_R_1 : (1 + lP, DECₐ pos0 0 :: nil) <sc (1 + lP, R) sc_R_2 : (2 + lP, DECₐ pos0 (1 + (2 + lP)) :: DECₐ pos0 (2 + lP) :: nil) <sc (1 + lP, R) R_sc : forall (i : nat) (rho : mm_instr (pos (S n))), (i, rho :: nil) <sc (1 + lP, R) -> i = 1 + lP /\\ rho = DECₐ pos0 0 \\/ i = 2 + lP /\\ rho = DECₐ pos0 (3 + lP) \\/ i = 3 + lP /\\ rho = DECₐ pos0 (2 + lP) R_no_self_loops : mm_no_self_loops (1 + lP, R) Q := g (1 + lP) 1 P ++ R : list (mm_instr (pos (S n))) Q_no_self_loops : mm_no_self_loops (1, Q) sc_Q_1 : forall (j : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)), (j, ρ :: nil) <sc (1, P) -> (j, f (1 + lP) j ρ :: nil) <sc (1, Q) sc_Q_2 : (1 + lP, DECₐ pos0 0 :: DECₐ pos0 (3 + lP) :: DECₐ pos0 (2 + lP) :: nil) <sc (1, Q) sc_Q_3 : (2 + lP, DECₐ pos0 (3 + lP) :: DECₐ pos0 (2 + lP) :: nil) <sc (1, Q) Q_sc : forall (j : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos (S n))), (j, ρ :: nil) <sc (1, Q) -> (exists ρ' : mm_instr (pos n), (j, ρ' :: nil) <sc (1, P) /\\ ρ = f (1 + lP) j ρ') \\/ j = 1 + lP /\\ ρ = DECₐ pos0 0 \\/ j = 2 + lP /\\ ρ = DECₐ pos0 (3 + lP) \\/ j = 3 + lP /\\ ρ = DECₐ pos0 (2 + lP) Q_length : length Q = lP + 3 i : nat x : pos (S n) j : nat H : (i, DECₐ x j :: nil) <sc (1, Q) Unable to unify "length Q = lP + 3" with "j < 1 + length Q".

original: intros i x j H. apply Q_length.
